statements: SELECT * FROM health_facility_inventory;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM health_facility_inventory ORDER BY item_name;
SELECT * FROM health_facility_inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM health_facility_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT item_id, quantity FROM health_facility_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_facility_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM health_facility_inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, expiration_date FROM health_facility_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM health_facility_inventory WHERE quantity < 30 OR expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM health_facility_inventory ORDER BY item_name
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT supply_name, supplier FROM supplies WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'P%' AND location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE supplier = 'Supplier X' AND quantity = 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity < 20;
SELECT supply_name, supplier FROM supplies WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY supplier DESC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity + 10 AS updated_quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT item_name, location, supply_name, supplier FROM inventory JOIN supplies ON inventory.item_name = supplies.supply_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, quantity_ordered, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 5
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT i.item_name, s.supplier_name, o.quantity_ordered FROM inventory i INNER JOIN orders o ON i.item_id = o.item_id INNER JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM Supplies ORDER BY supply_name DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM Supplies WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location FROM Supplies WHERE supply_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, expiration_date FROM Inventory ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT department_name, manager FROM Departments WHERE location = 'Head Office';
SELECT * FROM Supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supply_name DESC
SELECT supply_name, location FROM Supplies INNER JOIN Inventory ON Supplies.supply_id = Inventory.inventory_id WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE()
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) as total_staff FROM Departments INNER JOIN Staff ON Departments.department_id = Staff.department_id GROUP BY department_name
SELECT MAX(quantity) as max_quantity, MIN(quantity) as min_quantity FROM Supplies
SELECT staff_name, position FROM Staff WHERE department_id IN (SELECT department_id FROM Departments WHERE manager = 'John Doe')
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT patient_name, room_number FROM patients ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT supply_name, in_stock FROM supplies WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_id > 3;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 1;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, room_number FROM patients ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT supply_name, in_stock FROM supplies WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg';
